name: go-levelup-js
description: this file is just for running the tests. don't need to include or worry about this.

scripts.example: gopherjs build example/example.go -o example/example.js && node example/run.js > /tmp/levelupjsexampleoutput && icdiff example/expected /tmp/levelupjsexampleoutput && echo '' && echo 'if you do not see any diff above this line it is because everything is well.'
